sentence.Network_en: Corregidor: an island of the northern Philippines at the entrance to Manila Bay.
sentence.Network_cn: 柯雷吉多尔岛: 马尼拉湾入口处菲律宾群岛北部一个岛.

correggio 柯勒乔, corregidor 科雷希多岛, corregidor 科雷希多

list.abs: 促销包括到克雷吉多尔岛(corregidor island)的一日游和在马尼拉港的游轮晚餐。但我们得在不同的日期享受它们。

means.word_mean: 1. the peninsula and island in the Philippines where Japanese forces besieged American forces in World War II; United States forces surrendered in 1942 and recaptured the area in 1945

auth_sentence.content: In 1942, the island fortress of Corregidor in the Philippines surrendered to the Japanese.
auth_sentence.res_content: In 1942, the island fortress of Corregidor in the Philippines surrendered to the Japanese.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In 1942, the island fortress of Corregidor in the Philippines surrendered to the Japanese.
